alert.note: Alert for Erie; Huron (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 11:50AM EDT until April 01 at 12:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM EDT FOR HURON AND ERIE COUNTIES... At 1150 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles east of Sandusky to 6 miles northeast of Northern Milan to 7 miles south of Norwalk, moving east at 65 mph. Strong wind gusts in excess of 50 mph are continuing even after the rain exits. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Sandusky, Norwalk, Western Vermilion, Bellevue, Willard, New London, Plymouth, Northern Milan, Milan, Wakeman, Castalia, Greenwich, Monroeville, Marblehead, Berlin Heights, Bay View, North Fairfield, Bloomingville, Sandusky South and Birmingham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Strong wind gusts in excess of 50 mph will continue even after the rain exits.
